column5: Well Vince, since the photo passed the PM scrutiny, I'll post the full sized photo. Note; someone screamed like a little girl and no pike were harmed as a result of this 'incident'.
He thought it was a trout worm !
But it turned out to be a night crawler.
There are a slight change in standings, if you have anyother photos please send them in by the 15nth.  Thanks again guys  V

Hey Vince, Figured I'd get this up before contest close.  Addie goes ice fishing. Sturgeon Lake, March 13th.    Thanks for running the contest again Vince and girls. You done good :thumbsup_anim:.  Slayer

I would like to thank everyone that has participated this year, and a great big  goes out to you guys. I would like to personally thank ROD CASTER (Chad) for his donation of worm harnesses  Well my girls have decided, and there are enough prizes for 3 places . If you see your name down below, please pm me with your address.  We all know that this year was a terrible year for ice fishing, but we made the best of it. So heres rooting for a better ice season and more pics next year.  Thanks again  Vince, Samantha and Emily   First place                                           	Ron Second place                                           Leechman  Third place                                          	Pikeslayer
Awesome!! That was a good last minute entry Pikeslayer, haha. Congrats to Ron, leechman and Pikeslayer!

I would also like to give a great big thank you to our good friend Bigugli(bruce), for his donations that i received today  And once again thank you for posting your pics, I hope next year is bigger and better than ever. Till then, fish on guys  ITS TROLLING SEASON

Wow!  Check out the swag I got for simply uploading a picture!    Thanks once again for such generosity amungst all the members here at OFC!  I am looking forward to trying out BIGUGLY"S salsa.  Chad's worm harnesses are a fine piece of work as well.  Mostly, thanks to Vince and his girls for taking the time to put such a contest together.  Cheers, Ron...
WOW X2!!    Thanks again to the members for their generosity in donating top quality lures and to Vince and the judges (Emily & Sam) for hosting the contest  Tight lines Jacques
thought i had a big pike....      ended up beeing a pile of weeds!  i was in a sweet spot after all!

So far Ron is in lead and fishing 24/7 has added a photo for my young ones to view very soon. I know there isnt much ice around the southern parts but in lieu of it, I may be able to add soft water fishing only if the picture is time stamped. I will have to ask the judges about that. Just trying to make things fair for all.  Come on hard water

I'll throw my 2 in from this weekend. Personally the first one is my fav but thats just because I know the story behind it.         disclaimer on the second. No actual fish were harmed in the making of this photo (we even threw this one back)
Thanks for sharing jeremy, the judges will view the pics next weekend
my buddy said the perch weren't too bad if you eat all the little one as you catch em... then i opened his hut only to see this...lol  no perch were harmed in the making of this photo...lol
Keep them coming
Vince, here's one that I was trying to setup for the camera and it slip my grip when the flash went on   That was take one
He bit you didnt he jacques ?
Yep    but then he had a stiff upper lip and lost some weight

Just a bump and reminder for everyone. I know there isnt much ice, lets make the best of it for winternet sakes.  Soft water fishing is included with a date stamp on the photo(due to lack of ice this year)  Post it if you have a pic(s) , if not lets just have a good laugh!  My little ones will review the pics this weekend and a list will be made, good luck to all that has entered a pic. Contest closing date will be March 15/2012, so have them posted by that date.  Have fun and be safe out there  Vinnimon
Caption : "Follow me, the quickest way to the lake is to go straight down"

My girls have an update for all that has sent a picture in to us.  WE HAVE A TiE   1rst place - Ron and Leechman  2nd place- Muskie Mike  3rd place- Jeremy84  4rth place- Fishing 24/7  5th place-Rodcastor Good luck to all and thanks for the pics.  There are three weeks left, lets see some more pics
Hard core, you know you got it bad when...

Another bump and a reminder for all, the deadline for your pics are on march 15/2011 at 11:59 pm.  So far Ron and Leechman are tied for first. My girls cant come to an agreement as of yet If you have a pic to share, then by all means do so    Good luck  V
I was excited about this laker, what can I say, lol
glad you shaved your tounge for the photo...
Coming from a guy trying to walk his fish Keep them coming guys
Haha, good photos Bill and Twocoda.  Did that laker have a mowhawk and axe guitar?
This pic was sent to me from Pikeslayer, so im adding it in for him. Thanks for the photo Simon
Just a reminder and bump, the contest ends next thursday at 11:59 pm.  If you have a photo you would like to share,  please send it to me or post it to this topic.  Thank again folks and good luck
Ice fishing Mike...
00PS THANKS WAYNE

As I have posted before, I am once again hosting this contest once again. It went extremely well last year and decided to do it again this year. Yes I am hosting it but I am not the judge of it. My two wonderful daughters Samantha and Emily will judge all submitted photos once again  The rules are :  Keep it clean please for my daughters sake Must be this years photos Must be your own photos that were taken Just have fun and play safe You must sumit your photos to this thread or pm me with the photo(s) Start date was dec 25/2011 and ends on march 15/2012 11:59pm  There will prizes awarded at my cost and donations that have been received. I am striving for more so we can have 1rst, 2nd and 3rd place winners. I will post a pic of the prizes in due time and who has donted as well very soon.  If you wish to donate something, please pm me.  Please keep in mind that this is just for fun, for the sake of winternet, lol.  I do want to thank TJ and all the mods to allow me and my angels to do this once again   It was a blast last year, lets do the same this year  Good luck to all and happy fishing as well
Hey Vinnie, can we  add a caption with the photos?
Up to Vince of course but I'd say a caption would be gravy..sometimes even funnier than the pic itself.
Never heard of this but can we see the picture of last years winner so I can get an idea of what your looking for lol
I'm sure I can oblige you, Vince.
Sure, why not

Last years winner was irishfield, sorry I dont have a pic of it right at this moment. Heck if you like to fish in a tootoo, a dress or even if youve goofed up and your buds caught a pic of it. Whatever that gives you or your buds a chuckle. Just keep it clean for my girls sake, they are young.
I am sure you will bruce
Hey, it's not funny!    But it's a start...  Cheers, Ron...
Was that perch in Skip's pocket?
Can't be Nip , mine was'nt blowing a horn

I'll see what I can dig up Vince.  Should have got a pic of Juli kissing her first Ling on Monday, lol!  She didn't want to get near it, by the second day she was grabbing them out of the hole (with gloves on, of course)
HA HA, I like it. lol !  I would like to thank chad (rodcastor) from north bay for his donation
Maybe I can get one of Lloyd trolling behind the plane tomorrow....
OH my!!!!! Dare i ask .....ahhhhhh nevamind
you'll have to go back to about october to get this one ....... lol
Abrakeydabra ........poof ****
You might want to read those rules. again. skip...just sayin.
Brain bleach!!!!!!
Notice the line that states, "photos must be from this year"....plus, I don't think pulling random photos of the net, quite cuts it, either

Don't worrie Frankie , it was'nt put there to win any thing , every body knows i dont do hard water , its was for my sadisfaction that i atleast did some thing to make you laugh in the mean time til we have others to look at ...........lol .
Just a bump and a reminder
Can't this get pinned? Mods?

Afraid not Mike. Interest brings it to the top. I'm sure it'll live long and flourish. It's a great thread and it was a great thread last year as well. Your participation and everyone elses for this season will bring it back next year. This, so far, has not been the best ice fishing year because of the weather but I'm sure that the next month and a half should bring us a few priceless photos.

Muskie Mike, I am afraid not. As roy has mentioned there is little ice and once it it develops so will this thread. Last year was a blast and I am only doing this out of my own heart, a thank you to all OFC members. Also to keep winternet more interesting with a smile / many laughs here on OFC, last year was a blast.   Here is one I can add, but it doesnt count at all. The funny thing about this is the scent I put on my bait attracted the dog. A couple of drops ended up on the ice.
